widget.emptyDescription: Unfortunately, right now there are no approachable payment methods. Please try again later.
widget.emptyBankListContent: We support many banks in dozens of countries, but there may be exceptions. Please, try another payment method if you didn’t find your bank or country.

result.processingText: Thanks for your time! The payment is initiated. It may take a few minutes for the payment to be processed.  We will notify you once the payment is complete.
result.succeededText: We’re glad to inform you that your payment has been completed successfully . Thanks for your time!
result.errorText: An unexpected error occured while paying. Please try again later or choose another payment method.
result.canceledText: The payment has been declined by the provider. Please make sure that selected account is active and has sufficient funds for the current transaction.
